review.reviewer_comment: The dataset has passed the manual and automated QC steps and the readme has also been reviewed

pipeline_steps.name: ac2canonical.py
pipeline_steps.description: Python script for mapping the UniProtKB accessions in the input file to the UniProtKB canonical accessions

pipeline_steps.name: make-proteoform_glycosylation_sites_unicarbkb_glytoucan-csv-step2b.py
pipeline_steps.description: Python scripts for retrieving glycosylation type or linkage type through UniCarbKB structure webpage

pipeline_steps.name: make-proteoform_glycosylation_sites_unicarbkb_glytoucan-csv-step2b.py
pipeline_steps.description: Python scripts for retrieving glycosylation type or linkage type through UniCarbKB structure webpage

pipeline_steps.name: make-proteoform_glycosylation_sites_unicarbkb_glytoucan-csv-step3.py
pipeline_steps.description: Python script for quality check of the processed file. Records which fall under one or more following criteria's are flagged and eliminated and can be accessed using the log file. The elimination steps include -   a. If the protein accession is not included in UniProtKB protein list - UniProtKB Nov-2017 Release   b. If the amino acid position does not match to the amino acid on the associated position on fasta sequence - UniProtKB Nov-2017 Release  c. If the id (UnicarbKB structure id) is not present in input file  d. If the glycosylation type (linkage type) is not retrieved through step 3  e. If a serine or threonine is reported for an N-linked glycan structure  f. If an asparagine is reported for an O-linked glycan structure

statistics.comment: Unique value statistics for the dataset

statistics.description: Accession assigned to the protein isoform chosen to be the canonical sequence in UniProtKB database
Site on the protein sequence where glycosylation is observed
NCBI PubMed Id (PMID) as evidence for the entry
Unique accession assigned to the registered glycan structure in GlyTouCan database
Three letter code abbreviation of the amino acid

usability_domain: List of human [taxid:9606] proteins with information on glycosylation sites from UniCarbKB database [https://academic.oup.com/nar/article/42/D1/D215/1052197, https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkt1128]
